data.prayer: Lord, make the 997 believers in Îles Tuamotu-Gambier to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 15,304 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Îles Tuamotu-Gambier, French Polynesia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Îles Tuamotu-Gambier, French Polynesia.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 997 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Îles Tuamotu-Gambier.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 997 believers in Îles Tuamotu-Gambier and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 12,655 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Îles Tuamotu-Gambier, French Polynesia and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Îles Tuamotu-Gambier, French Polynesia to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.
